name: $active
desc: Actions implied by the prescription are to be temporarily halted, but are expected to continue later.  May also be called "suspended".

name: $cancelled
desc: All actions that are implied by the prescription have occurred.

name: $completed
desc: The prescription was entered in error.

name: $entered-in-error
desc: Actions implied by the prescription are to be permanently halted, before all of them occurred.

name: $stopped
desc: The prescription is not yet 'actionable', i.e. it is a work in progress, requires sign-off or verification, and needs to be run through decision support process.

name: $draft
desc: The authoring system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this request
